basics.name: Cade Ward
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Cade has a deep passion for technologies. When he doesn't have to be thinking about anything else, he's thinking about how to solve recent problems he's come across in developing some kind of application. He loves building applications, both small and large scale. He loves to keep things simple, and as automated as possible.

work.summary: Kuali creates modular, cloud-based software that’s beautifully designed and easy to use. We’re developing simpler ways for you to manage what has become amazingly complex. And we’re making our solutions affordable so that you can focus your time and resources on the real business of higher education: teaching, learning, and research.
highlights: Built and maintained an application to ease the process of curriculum management at higher education institutions using Node.JS and React.
Helped build a logging service for other internal kuali services in Node.js
Had the opportunity to build our entire infrastructure in AWS, including networking, pipelines that take code from repo to production, monitoring, and scaling.
Provide technical trainings for conferences and specific institutions, including Kuali's annual Kuali Days conference.

work.summary: Lightning Kite is a dev shop building strikingly good software for a number of clients, both local and afar.
highlights: Built a mobile app using cross platform tools to manage all aspects of business for Discount Tires co.
Built the entire front end for a local title company to manage quotes for new and existing customers.
Had the opportunity to help on a project for a local company helping kids to learn how to read.
Automated varias tasks for the Controller's Office.
Completely rebuilt the Controller's Office main web page.
Created an internal reportal portal for USU's financial staff.
Maintained several servers for the Controller's Office.
